series.maps.1.isDecider.label: If Map 1 is the Decider (for Best of 1s, set this to false)

series.maps.1.pickTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that picked this map

series.maps.1.enemyTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that did not pick this map

series.maps.2.isDecider.label: If Map 2 is the Decider (for Best of 1s, set this to false)

series.maps.2.pickTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that picked this map

series.maps.2.enemyTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that did not pick this map

series.maps.3.isDecider.label: If Map 3 is the Decider (for Best of 1s, set this to false)

series.maps.3.pickTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that picked this map

series.maps.3.enemyTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that did not pick this map

series.maps.4.isDecider.label: If Map 4 is the Decider (for Best of 1s, set this to false)

series.maps.4.pickTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that picked this map

series.maps.4.enemyTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that did not pick this map

series.maps.5.isDecider.label: If Map 5 is the Decider (for Best of 1s, set this to false)

series.maps.5.pickTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that picked this map

series.maps.5.enemyTeamScore.label: Final Score of the team that did not pick this map

cvars.cash_team_loser_bonus.label: Value of cash_team_loser_bonus, i.e. the initial loss bonus amount

cvars.cash_team_loser_bonus_consecutive_.label: Value of cash_team_loser_bonus_consecutive_rounds, i.e. the additional loss bonus amount per consecutive round lost

cvars.mp_c4timer.label: Value of mp_c4timer, i.e. the number of seconds from when the bomb is planted until it explodes

cvars.mp_roundtime.label: Value of mp_roundtime, i.e. the default number of minutes a round can take

cvars.mp_team_timeout_max.label: Value of mp_team_timeout_max, i.e. the number of tactical timeouts available per team

cvars.mp_team_timeout_time.label: Value of mp_team_timeout_time, i.e. the duration in seconds of each tactical timeout

preferences.sidebar.teamGrenades.hideDur.label: Hode Team Grenades panels in sidebars during the round (if no, will only show during freezetimes, and the first few seconds of the round (defined in preferences.sidebar.teamGrenades.activeIntoRoundSec))

preferences.sidebar.teamGrenades.activeI.label: Number of seconds into the round the Team Grenades panel should be visible (0 to disable; ignored when preferences.sidebar.teamGrenades.hideDuringRound is set to no)

preferences.sidebar.teamEquipment.active.label: Number of seconds into the round the Team Money and Equipment panel should be visible (0 to disable)

preferences.seriesGraph.showMapForOnlyMa.label: Show map name and screenshot in the Series Graph, even if there is only a single match in the series

css.base-scale-factor.label: Base size that everything is sized relative to; e.g. `10px`

optionSectionDescriptions.Style Overrides: NB: To apply changes, click Save, then Force HUD Refresh.
